tags: seriously though i really wanna revisit it
and im so glad you liked it!!!
summary: I really adore that snippet you wrote with angelYasha and demonMolly lost in the woods. If you ever feel the urge to write...
question: I really adore that snippet you wrote with angelYasha and demonMolly lost in the woods. If you ever feel the urge to write further FOLLOW YOUR FEEEEEEEEEELINGS
answer:
askdhajsdk thank you very very much!! I had a TON of fun with it, and if not for the 30+ prompts in my box, the 2 WIPS plaguing my AO3, and the 3 fic ideas I haven’t even started yet, I definitely would keep going! Then again, it’s very possible I’ll just do that anyways because I am bad at Time Management.

(if you want to read what they’re talking about, it’s here!)

askdhajsdk thank you very very much!! I had a TON of fun with it, and if not for the 30+ prompts in my box, the 2 WIPS plaguing my AO3, and the 3 fic ideas I haven’t even started yet, I definitely would keep going! Then again, it’s very possible I’ll just do that anyways because I am bad at Time Management.

(if you want to read what they’re talking about, it’s here!)

blog.name: dndcharacterideas
blog.title: D&D Character Ideas
blog.description:
This blog has been created so I would have a place to put my ideas for D&D characters and maybe the story of a few characters I've played in the past. 

If you have a concept, story, dungeon map or just an image that you've made and would like to share, by all means feel free to submit it.

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: So I finally got my medicine and then took a four hour nap and I’m finally feeling a little more human but i had a dream that...
body: So I finally got my medicine and then took a four hour nap and I’m finally feeling a little more human but i had a dream that Caduceus is freaked out by undead stuff so much because one of his siblings died and somehow got revived as an evil flower thing, because the Clay family still reminds me very much of the dang Undertale goats.

blog.name: jabletown
blog.title: A Shorthalt Trickfoot Strongjaw Household
blog.description: Jables, Jable, Baehj2915 on AO3. Header image of tumblr user not-just-an-acrobat's art

summary:
yashas-strong-arms
 replied to your post  “modern au adventures  most of the vm gang is from the UK except for...”
             ...
body:
yashas-strong-arms replied to your post “modern au adventures  most of the vm gang is from the UK except for…”
And grog? He’s from where pike’s from I take it?

i don’t have a good solution to that modern au problem, bc it’s pretty important that grog is not from where pike is. sure he makes westruun his home, but that’s not the same thing. 

there is no modern au equivalent for a nomadic pillaging goliath herd. obviously you can make some connection to grog being an immigrant in the sense that he’s an outsider but you’d have to be pretty gentle with that treatment, bc of course irl there is no inherent criminality to immigration, and it’s no corollary to grog’s backstory. 

the best idea i ever came up with for modern au grog was that grog comes out of one of those gritty brit underclass movies about illegal fighting, uncle kevdak being some kind of mobster who runs a book and grog being a prize fighter and the inevitable falling out between them.

but how to connect that to pike? and my favorite notion that she’s from fantasy ohio/wisconsin? i have no idea. 

so obviously it’s something else.
